suite.name: Gedie Tests

kw.name: Open Browser To Login Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
Abre o navegador e navega para a página de login

test.name: (H2C1) Login Bem Sucedido Com Credenciais Corretas

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Attempt Login
Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verify On Dashboard Page
Wait Until Location Is
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL is ``expected``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
Verifica se está na página do dashboard

kw.name: Run Keywords
Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.
Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.
